item.description:
[b]"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND."

FRIDAY, SEPTEMBER 10, at RAFFAEL’S, 1601 Main St., Rte. 1A, Walpole. (508)668-8071
www.se-4u.com.
Dancing with music by award-winning DJ from 8:30-12:00 AM.
FREE SWING DANCE LESSONS 7:30-8:30.
Complimentary buffet all night, free door prizes, and MATCH GAME prizes.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES & COUPLES, 35-65 years old.
Cost is $13 ALL NIGHT.
Proper business dress is required for men; sports jacket or dress shirt & tie at minimum; business or party finery for women.
Info, call (781)446-0234.
Co-sponsored by Rhode Island’s Most Eligible Singles.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Pam at the door.
item.name: "SINGLES WITH STYLE" SINGLES DANCE
